metadata.title: CVE-2021-39903 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In all versions of GitLab CE/EE since version 13.0, a privileged user,through an API call, can change the visibility level of a group or aproject to a restricted option even after the instance administrator setsthat visibility option as restricted in settings.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
